news.title: Justia Webinars: Charisma In-Person and on LinkedIn: Business Development for Attorneys
news.description: Sometimes, it is not enough just to have a business card and a website to tell people, “I am here.” In a competitive legal landscape filled with people who have business cards and websites, you need more to draw the eyes of potential clientele and build your law firm. You need charisma.

news.title: TikTok News: Best Practices Guide for Ad Campaigns and Bidding Strategies
news.description: TikTok has released a new guide with actionable tips and recommendations to enhance the effectiveness of ad campaigns on its platform. Read this post to uncover strategies for refining ad campaigns and optimizing bidding techniques.

news.title: Justia Legal Resources: Elder Law Center
news.description: Aging Americans deserve to enjoy comfortable and dignified lives. However, they may face certain risks or challenges involving their age and declining health. The Elder Law Center at Justia sheds more light on these issues.

news.title: Justia CLE & Webinars: Understanding Loan Transactions for the Non-Finance Attorney
news.description: As a lawyer, you may come across loan transactions even if you are not a finance attorney. What do you need to do, and what do all these documents in a loan document package even mean? Now is the time to demystify it all so you can elevate your law firm practice and ensure quality legal representation for all your clients!

news.title: Justia Legal Resources: Workers’ Compensation Law Center
news.description: Despite workplace safety laws, accidents happen on the job all too often. These generally trigger a right to medical, wage, and other benefits. The Workers’ Compensation Law Center at Justia describes the rules governing these programs.
